question: Which of the following statements/ situation indicates a better welfare due to rising per capita income?
option1: The per capita income increases with no change in overall income distribution
option2: The per capita income increases with change in the income distribution in favor of the Rich
option3: The per capita income increases with change in the income distribution in favor of the Poor
option4: The per capita income increases with change in the income distribution in favor of the Industrial Labor
answer: The per capita income increases with change in the income distribution in favor of the Poor
